title: What Presidents Ensnared in Impeachment Said—in Their Own Words
text:
Only four presidents have ever been embroiled in impeachment proceedings. Andrew Johnson and Bill Clinton were acquitted after Senate trials, while Richard Nixon resigned in the face of a likely impeachment trial and conviction. The investigation into President Trump continues.

All defended themselves vigorously against the accusations they faced, but they differed in how they spoke about their actions and the proceedings, as did their congressional questioners. Here’s a look at what both sides had to say during the four...
